aspguidp.controller.input.element

Class ValueInputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.controller.input.element.InputElementController

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Project_managementValueInputController

    public abstract class ValueInputController
extends InputElementController
    Base controller class for an value input component. This class implements functionality which is used by all value input components of the application.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeValueField

        protected void initializeValueField(DataServicePool servicePool,
                                    javafx.scene.control.TextField inputField,
                                    javafx.scene.control.TextField backgroundField)
        Initialize the given stacked field (which consists of an input field and a background field) with the given data service pool.

        This method initializes the validation of the stacked field, sets up a handler which updates the value of the field, when the value data manager of the given service pool changes its value and initializes an autocomplete popup for the given stacked field.

        Additionally, the execution status and the data status of the field is registered to the execution/data status manager of the application and a focus propagation handler is initialized for the stacked field.

        Parameters:
        servicePool - service pool which holds the data services which are used to initialize the stacked field
        inputField - input field of the stacked field which is initialized
        backgroundField - background field of the stacked field which is initialized
